name: The Adventures of Kedar and Bholu

metadata.name: Episode 2 - The Metaverse
metadata.description:
1/1

In Chapter 1, Kedar and Bholu are taken to a strange dimension. Here they find themselves taken to the Metaverse. Kedar ,still zonked from the portal transforms Bholu to the Elephant Avatar . This marks the Journey into to chapter 3 in the twisted realm to fight crypto villains and attain Nirvana.


Resolution -
3840 x 2160

The music is produced by @theycallmecalm from the Rap Dup Seedhemaut !
